name: animated
title: :animated Selector
desc: Select all elements that are in the progress of an animation at the time the selector is run.

examples.desc: Change the color of any div that is animated.
examples.css:
div { background:yellow; border:1px solid #AAA; width:80px; height:80px; margin:0 5px; float:left; }
  div.colored { background:green; }

entries.longdesc: Note: If you use a custom jQuery build without the effects module, the :animated selector will throw an error.
